english.segment1: In between. Wools and weaves. Knots and ties. Unhinged eyes. Constantly. Panicky. He's hunting me
english.segment2: Fa, la, la, la. Quite quieter than spiders
english.segment3: Either one. None will numb. What to use. To misuse?. Walls to climb. Fangs to hide. Immobilize
english.segment4: Fa, la, la, la. Quite quieter than spiders.
